OOC - Vice Grip is digigng, Waspinator is flying (and probably going to be =
crushed at some point, Dinobot is running on the ground.  Feel free to post=
 something kabonging Waspy.  It's his state in life!


>
> As the party qui=
ckly moves away from the clearing and towards the jungle, the area foliage =
quickly becomes much denser. As they are still following a trail they are s=
till able to pass through it relatively easily, but at the sides of the tra=
il the brush and plants are becoming thicker and greener. However as we hav=
e night still falling, the way ahead is getting darker, and the gnarled tre=
e limbs beginning to look as much like claws as they do wood. 
> 
> For tho=
se who have chosen to fly. Before them would be what appears to be an a dar=
k ocean of or dark green water complete with waves as the tops of tress mov=
e lazily in response to unseen breezes. The sky itself is clear and bright,=
 very little in the way of cloud cover and the moon is just beginning to ma=
ke itself seen as it rises up over the horizon of trees. A casual gaze down=
ward shows the rest of the group walking along, wether in robot mode or bea=
st mode, but a quick glance ahead showed that in very short order the group=
 below will be harder and harder to locate due to the every increasing dens=
ity of the plant life. 
> 
> For those who were burrowing along underground=
, even their way was becoming slowed with the massive entanglement of roots=
 that sat just beneath the surface of the ground. 
> 
> However for all tea=
ms there is one constant. Within the space of a mile the communications go =
from crystal clear to non-existent. Even the IFF com-signal goes down, and =
everyone is restricted to sensory recognition only. Even sensors are muffle=
d somewhat, although visual, audio and olfactory senses appear to be unaffe=
cted. 
> 
> At the front of the group on the ground LEO PRIME walked in bea=
st mode, a lion stalking through the jungle, looking completely at home her=
e. TORCA, who was in an almost nightmarerish fusion of elephant and killer =
whale walked next to him, and on the other side was SANTON in his MAMMOTH b=
east mode. 
> 
> Around these three ranges the rest of the Maxmals, some in=
 the air, like AIRHAMMER, NOCTORRO and WINGCALIBER while there were others =
on the ground like BANTOR. 
> 
> Then again the PREDACONS were here too, ma=
king their presence felt as they flew and walked. SKYSHADOW was in the air =
in beast mode along with BUZZCLAW and INJECTOR, while QUICKSTRIKE and TERRO=
RGATOR walked on the ground. 
> 
> "This way!" LEO PRIME said as he walked =
on. "The signal is coming from this way." He was carrying the makeshift tra=
cking device, its signal taking him darker and darker into the dark of the =
Jungle!
> 
> OOC: I am not sure who is flying and who is walking. Most I ca=
n make assumptions on. Is Hydras flying or walking, I am not sure if the Hy=
dra has wings? Also is Buzzsaw going to be flying above the trees or just b=
elow the treeline. Either one is possible, although it will call for some f=
ancy flying to stay below as the trees get denser. 
> 

<NEW>

At this poin=
t, as the group came on to a seeming battle sight, DINOBOT held up then as =
the MAXIMALS took the forefront.  Tracking was not his forte, and for now h=
e would remain mostly quiet.  HE was along for muscle, after all.

Whereas =
VICE GRIP was an expert tracker of some ability, for the moment he was not =
visible (and eprhaps unknown) just digging along over underground.  Along w=
ith DRILL BIT, a few dozen meters and tracking the TRANSFORMERS up above by=
 their IFF signals through the dirt, going past heavy roots and vines under=
neath.

And WASPINATOR, flying along in the air, went very, very slowly.  W=
hile he was an agile and adept flier, the increasing undergrowth made him s=
low down heavily to avoid being bludgeoned.

And so, as they found tracks, =
DINOBOT watched as the battle sight was analyzed by the MAXIMALS, waiting f=
or further instructions.
